translation.en: Perfect.
[man 1] Dad, my interview is about to start.
translation.it: Papà, l'intervista sta per iniziare. Che è successo al Wi-Fi?

translation.en: -What happened to the Wi-Fi? -Try by the window.
translation.it: Papà, l'intervista sta per iniziare. Che è successo al Wi-Fi? - Prova alla finestra. - Non può stare alla finestra,

translation.en: No, he can't go over by the window. I've just set up all of this here.
translation.it: - Prova alla finestra. - Non può stare alla finestra, ho preparato tutto qui.

translation.en: Yeah. Thoughts?
Subtle.
Okay. We're back. Could someone tell Kayla not to blast music while I'm doing this?
translation.it: Eccoci. Potreste dire a Kayla di non sparare la musica mentre parlo?

translation.en: Your interview's not for 15 minutes. Go tell her yourself.
translation.it: L'intervista è tra un quarto d'ora. Diglielo tu.

translation.en: I gotta keep an eye on Mom. We're one step away from baby photos.
translation.it: Devo controllare mamma o metterà le mie foto da piccolo.

translation.en: Oh, good. How else would anyone know what sport I play?
translation.it: Bene. Cos'altro per far sapere che sport pratico?

translation.en: Kayla, turn the music down, please.
translation.it: Kayla, abbassa la musica, per favore.

translation.en: Mac's asking if--
Okay.
Three, two, one.
One day you're gonna be a second late, and I'm gonna worry.
translation.it: Un giorno tarderai di un secondo e mi preoccuperò.

translation.en: [laughs] Not a chance. Anyway, I'm on Canadian time. So technically, I'm five hours early.
translation.it: Non esiste. E poi sono in Canada. Tecnicamente cinque ore in anticipo.

translation.en: Ugh, even time is better back home.
translation.it: Anche il tempo è migliore a casa.

translation.en: You need a countdown?
I'll know.
[journalist] So, let's break this down.
You're scoring week in, week out.
Scouts flocking to your games, home and away,
translation.it: Gli osservatori si affollano alle tue partite, in casa e fuori

translation.en: and then you move to England! -[chuckles] -Are you on the run?
translation.it: e tu ti trasferisci in Inghilterra? Stai fuggendo?

translation.en: No. One word. Hammarström.
So, Anton "The Hammer" Hammarström
moves to England and sets up a center of excellence
translation.it: si sposta in Inghilterra e crea un centro di eccellenza

translation.en: that has produced no less than six international superstars.
translation.it: che ha prodotto non meno di sei superstar internazionali.

translation.en: You gonna be number seven?
Yeah, that's the plan.
Come on. She had no curfew back home. All of this is new for her.
translation.it: Non aveva il coprifuoco a casa. È tutta una novità per lei.

translation.en: She has a curfew because this is new for her.
-Maybe she's with friends. -She doesn't have any friends yet.
translation.it: - Forse è con amici. - Non ne ha ancora.

translation.en: All right, look. One problem at a time?
[journalist] Hammarström used to play with your dad, right?
translation.it: Hammarström giocava con tuo padre, vero?

translation.en: I think it'd be more accurate to say that my dad played with Hammarström.
translation.it: È più preciso dire che mio padre giocava con Hammarström.

translation.en: Luke MacBentley did not smash any NHL records.
translation.it: Luke MacBentley non ha battuto alcun record nella NHL.

translation.en: [journalist chuckles] Okay.
So we got some more questions coming in here from Sean in Alberta.
translation.it: Abbiamo altre domande da parte di Sean da Alberta.

translation.en: Come on. We're distracting Mac.
Back home, you are known as the Mac-gician.
translation.it: A casa sei conosciuto come Mac il mago.

translation.en: Do your new teammates have any nicknames for you yet?
translation.it: I nuovi compagni hanno soprannomi per te?

translation.en: If she's not home by ten, I'm gonna call the police.
translation.it: Se non rientra per le dieci, chiamo la polizia.

translation.en: Oh, honey. She's 15.
She's 15.
[sighs] Drama queen.
[journalist] Okay.
Drama queen?
It's not so obviously cool as Mac-gician, but--
translation.it: Non è così fico come Mac il mago, ma...

translation.en: -No, no. I'm… I'm still the-- -[phone chimes]
Oh no.
Nineteen missed calls.
[boy] Yikes. On a scale from one to grounded, where do you think you're at?
translation.it: Accidenti. Su una scala da uno a essere punita, dove pensi di essere?

translation.en: Well, they don't know I snuck into the rink, which is good.
translation.it: Non sanno che sono sgattaiolata in pista.

translation.en: And I've still got the "Mac uprooted me and dragged me to England" card, so…
translation.it: E ho ancora la carta "Mac mi ha sradicato trascinandomi in Inghilterra", quindi…

translation.en: Three?
Same time tomorrow?
We need to nail those jumps if we're gonna be ready for Ice Burn.
translation.it: Dobbiamo controllare i salti per l'Ice Burn.

translation.en: Signal's really bad.
Uh, no. I… I heard.
What?
[Jacob] Kayla,
how are we gonna do Ice Burn? You're in England.
translation.it: come faremo l'Ice Burn? Sei in Inghilterra.

translation.en: No, I know, but--
[Jacob] Just… I love these long-distance skates.
They're… they're great. They're really fun. But I mean, we're not…
translation.it: È fantastico, divertente, ma noi non siamo...

translation.en: And I mean, it's… [chuckles]
I'm still your best friend, that's not gonna change, but it's just…
translation.it: Sono il tuo migliore amico e lo sarò sempre, solo...

translation.en: Still on for tomorrow night?
I don't know if this is such a good idea. I--
translation.it: Non so se sia una buona idea. Io...

translation.en: Shoot. My mom's calling.
Look, we'll talk tomorrow.
Okay?
Yep.
Yeah. Yeah, see you to--
Bye.
Out of your window, Kayla?
I mean, really?
What's wrong?
I just thought it wouldn't matter.
I know that sounds crazy. I just thought
translation.it: So che sembra assurdo. Pensavo che

translation.en: you can put us in Canada and England
translation.it: potessi portarci in Canada, e in Inghilterra o

translation.en: or the moon and Timbuktu, and we'd find a way.
translation.it: potessi portarci in Canada, e in Inghilterra o sulla luna e Timbuktu e avremmo trovato una soluzione.

translation.en: I mean, they found ice on the moon, right?
translation.it: Hanno trovato ghiaccio sulla luna, no?

translation.en: [mom] Oh, sweetheart.
I'm getting princess emojis from people I haven't spoken to since elementary school.
translation.it: Ricevo emoji di principesse da gente con cui non parlo dalle elementari!

translation.en: This is your fault. You ruined my interview for Iceblast, Kayla.
translation.it: È colpa tua. Hai rovinato la mia intervista per Iceblast, Kayla.

translation.en: Not now, Mac. Yeah?
-You are gonna find a new partner, Kayla. -[footsteps stomping]
-You know that, right? -[door slams]
Even here.
On the moon.
Because you, you could skate with anyone.
translation.it: Perché tu puoi pattinare con chiunque.

translation.en: But it's not about anyone.
Wh… Why is Mac getting princess emojis?
translation.it: Perché Mac riceve emoji di principesse?

translation.en: Well, he got confused,
and he told 900 people that his nickname was Drama Queen.
translation.it: e ha detto a 900 persone che il suo soprannome era Primadonna.

translation.en: Awesome.
Mama, if I leave the ice earlier, I can change at the rink.
translation.it: Mamma, se smetto un po' prima, posso cambiarmi in pista.

translation.en: Leave the ice earlier? Ava, you need to work on your priorities.
translation.it: Smettere di pattinare prima? Ava, devi lavorare sulle tue priorità.

translation.en: "Mama, I need to change at the rink. Mama, I should be at school."
translation.it: "Mamma, devo cambiarmi in pista. Mamma, devo andare a scuola."

translation.en: Is that Mrs. Hammarström?
Was. I haven't seen her since your dad stopped playing. That must be Ava.
translation.it: Era. Non la vedo da quando tuo padre ha smesso di giocare. Lei dev'essere Ava.

translation.en: That's your father's latest prodigy.
translation.it: Ecco l'ultimo prodigio di tuo padre.

translation.en: All these hockey stars he flies in,
translation.it: Con tutte le stelle dell'hockey che incontra,

translation.en: and he can't see the skating sensation right in front of him.
translation.it: non vede la grande pattinatrice che ha di fronte.

translation.en: But you're gonna show him, aren't you, Ava? Yeah. I will show him.
translation.it: - Ma glielo farai vedere vero, Ava? - Sì. Gli farò vedere io!

translation.en: That's my girl.
Okay. Looked at me funny. Well, yeah, 'cause you've got…
translation.it: - Ok, mi ha guardato in modo strano. - Beh, sì, perché hai…

translation.en: Is it gone?
Kay… Kayla. Is it gone?
Hey, Kayla? Kayla!
Hey, is it gone?
[woman] Kayla! Hey, sweetheart. I almost forgot.
[sighs] So, this is an open invitational.
Look, I know it's a bit soon,
but I just thought if you could find a partner,
translation.it: ma ho pensato che se trovassi un partner...

translation.en: obviously, you qualify for the UK team through me.
translation.it: Grazie a me sei qualificata per la squadra inglese.

translation.en: This could be a chance for medals, sweetheart. You know, your first step on that path.
translation.it: È una chance per le medaglie, tesoro. Il tuo primo passo in quella direzione.

translation.en: Yeah?
Mac's only been here two weeks. He's still trying to impress.
translation.it: Mac è qui da due settimane. Cerca ancora di fare colpo.

translation.en: Look, there's trying to impress, and then there's just showing off.
translation.it: Una cosa è fare colpo, un'altra è mettersi in mostra.

translation.en: Take yesterday, right? Four players surrounding him, and he still did not pass.
translation.it: Prendi ieri, ok? Circondato da quattro giocatori e non ha passato.

translation.en: And he got around them and scored.
translation.it: Li ha aggirati e ha segnato.

translation.en: That's not the point, Bear.
translation.it: Non è questo il punto, Bear.

translation.en: [boy] Mac!
Saved you a spot.
Thanks.
Sam's a fan.
Your brother isn't the one always shouting for a puck that never comes, is he?
translation.it: Tuo fratello non è quello che urla per un disco che non arriva mai?

translation.en: Just… Just one teeny, little prank.
Play nice, Nico.
Captain's orders.
Burger, large fries?
Thanks.
-Do you want some ketchup? -Sure.
Here you go.
Thank you.
Enjoy your meal.
[Bear] Okay, Hammers. Practice over.
Easy, man. You'll put a hole in the net. And my brother.
translation.it: Piano, amico. Così buchi la rete. E mio fratello.

translation.en: Train at 100. Play at 100.
[Bear] Training's done. Let's get a drink.
I go until I miss.
-How many was that? -I've lost count.
translation.it: - Quanti punti? - Ho perso il conto.

translation.en: Sounds about right.
If I'm at my best, then you guys are at yours, okay? So…
translation.it: Se sono al mio meglio, lo sarete anche voi, ok? Quindi…

translation.en: We'll be fine, man. No need to be a drama queen.
translation.it: Andrà bene, amico. Non serve fare la primadonna.

translation.en: -[Sam] Yes! -You missed one.
Bear, did you see that? [laughs]
-Do you ever skate? -No, I just work here.
translation.it: Hai mai pattinato? - No, qui ci lavoro. - Sicura o fingi per avere cibo gratis?

translation.en: You sure, or just pretend to for free food?
translation.it: - No, qui ci lavoro. - Sicura o fingi per avere cibo gratis?

translation.en: [chuckles] I wish.
Mum runs the cafe. She likes to keep an eye on me.
translation.it: Mamma gestisce il bar. Le piace tenermi d'occhio.

translation.en: Isn't that right, Mum?
I can't answer that, Sky, because I'm not eavesdropping.
translation.it: Non posso rispondere, Sky, non sto origliando.

translation.en: -Are you some kind of master criminal? -Something like that.
translation.it: - Sei forse un genio criminale? - Una specie.

translation.en: Kayla. Look, I would…
Cool mustache. Thanks, I grew it myself.
translation.it: - Bei baffi. - Grazie, li ho fatti io.

translation.en: 'Sup, Kay?
Hey.
Who's your friend?
So predictable. I'm Sky. You're Kayla's brother?
translation.it: - Prevedibile. - Sono Sky. Tu sei il fratello di Kayla?

translation.en: Mac. Yeah, yeah. I won the hockey scholarship.
translation.it: Mac. Sì. Ho vinto la borsa di hockey.

translation.en: I don't know if you realized I was the one banging in all the goals.
translation.it: Non so se hai notato che sono stato io a segnare tutti i goal.

translation.en: You know, it's kinda my…
thing. [sighs]
-Are goals important in hockey? -Pretty important.
And that's your helmet? Yeah. You know, I, uh, got a nice smile, so…
translation.it: - E quello è il tuo casco? - Sì. Sai, ho un bel sorriso, quindi...

translation.en: gotta make sure I keep all my teeth.
Is it specially made?
Oh, just 'cause I thought it would have to be to fit your massive ego.
translation.it: Oh, pensavo lo fosse per adattarsi al tuo ego smisurato.

translation.en: No, it's… it's pretty standard.
Besides, look, I gotta go get changed,
translation.it: E poi, devo andare a cambiarmi.

translation.en: but I don't know. I'll see you around.
translation.it: Ma, non so, ci si vede in giro?

translation.en: Maybe?
Maybe.
I'll try not to let my massive ego hit the door on the way out.
translation.it: Cercherò di non colpire la porta col mio ego smisurato.

translation.en: Oh, I feel bad. It's like being mean to a puppy.
translation.it: Mi sento in colpa. È come far male ad un cucciolo.

translation.en: The only thing Mac and a puppy have in common is needing to be trained.
translation.it: Solo la necessità di addestramento unisce Mac ad un cucciolo.

translation.en: They might look cute, but give 'em an inch,
translation.it: Sembrano carini, ma dagli un dito

translation.en: and they'll drag your family to a continent where you can't skate.
translation.it: e vi trascineranno in un continente dove non puoi pattinare.

translation.en: If only we had a rink. -I was in a pair. -[Sky] Ah.
translation.it: - Se solo avessimo una pista. - Pattinavo in coppia.

translation.en: -Can you find a partner here? -You sound like my mom.
translation.it: - Qui non trovi un partner? - Sembri mia madre.

translation.en: I could.
Just, it's never been about that.
-What's it about? -[Kayla] I don't know.
translation.it: E qual è? Non lo so.

translation.en: Just skating so in sync that you're, like, connected or something.
translation.it: Pattinare con una tale sintonia da sembrare connessi.

translation.en: I don't know. It's like speaking a new language.
translation.it: Non so. È come parlare una nuova lingua.

translation.en: Sounds very special. I guess that doesn't come along every day.
translation.it: Sembra speciale. Immagino non succeda tutti i giorni.

translation.en: No, it doesn't.
Three, two, one.
-[ringing] -Pick up, pick up, pick up, pick up.
You can do a double axel?
Sweetheart, I can hear you thinking from here.
translation.it: Tesoro, sento i tuoi pensieri da qui.

translation.en: Sorry. School stuff.
Okay. Well… [kisses] …don't be late, okay? And make sure you bring your skates to the rink today.
translation.it: Bene, non fare tardi, ok? E porta i pattini in pista oggi.

translation.en: Why?
We sort of maybe asked someone to audition to be your new partner.
translation.it: Abbiamo chiesto un'audizione a qualcuno per farti da partner.

translation.en: -Mom. -[mom] He's great. Okay, Kayla?
translation.it: - Mamma. - No. È forte. Ok, Kayla?

translation.en: He is great. He's called Archie. He's 15, and trust me.
translation.it: È fantastico. Si chiama Archie. Ha 15 anni, fidati di me.

translation.en: Honestly, he is fab.
-This is terrible. -He's, like, half her height.
translation.it: - È terribile. - È la metà di lei.

translation.en: [mom] Well, that is an exaggeration. Maybe three quarters.
translation.it: Beh, non esagerare. Forse tre quarti.

translation.en: It's gonna be a disaster.
This is gonna be awesome.
[Archie] So, you're American?
Uh, Canadian.
Ah, I've been to America before.
So, um, you've been looking for a partner long?
translation.it: Quindi, è tanto che cerchi una partner?

translation.en: A while. [chuckles]
I keep dropping them.
Right.
Shall we?
Okay.
I… I would help you up, but this tends to be where I drop people.
translation.it: Ti aiuterei, ma è qui che tendo a far cadere la gente.

translation.en: Can we please just be honest and acknowledge how bad that was? I'd feel so much better.
translation.it: Possiamo essere onesti e riconoscere quanto è stato brutto? Mi sentirei meglio.

translation.en: -Good. I'm so glad you said. -I'm so sorry, love. It's my fault.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, tesoro, è colpa mia.

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, I thought you were bringing him down, really.
translation.it: Sì. Pensavo fossi tu a distruggerlo.

translation.en: Can we just go home?
Well, Anton's back today, so it'd be good to stay and support Mac.
translation.it: Anton è tornato, sarebbe carino restare a sostenere Mac.

translation.en: He watched you, right? So it'd be nice.
translation.it: Lui ti ha guardato, no? Sarebbe gentile.

translation.en: Yeah, Kayla.
I watched you. -So it'd be nice. -[mom] Mac.
translation.it: - Ti ho guardato. Sarebbe gentile. - Mac.

translation.en: Hammarström can cut me loose at any time. I gotta hit the ground running.
translation.it: Hammarström può farmi fuori quando vuole. Devo darmi da fare.

translation.en: Can I get you a milkshake?
[claps] Let's go, you.
Are you okay? Have you got a fever? Headache? Mum, I'm fine.
translation.it: - Stai bene? Febbre? Mal di testa? - Mamma, sto bene.

translation.en: You know what the doctor said.
translation.it: Hai sentito il dottore, non sei fuori pericolo.

translation.en: You're not out of the woods yet. You have to be so careful.
translation.it: Hai sentito il dottore, non sei fuori pericolo. - Devi stare attenta. - Ok, ora ho mal di testa.

translation.en: Okay, now I have a headache.
translation.it: - Devi stare attenta. - Ok, ora ho mal di testa.

translation.en: Okay, Hammers. Let's go! Go! Go!
Mac, let's show Anton exactly why you're here.
translation.it: Mac, mostriamo ad Anton perché sei qui, ok?

translation.en: -All right? -[Mac] All right.
I need a captain's performance from you today, all right? Captain's. Go.
translation.it: Mi serve una performance da capitano, ok? Da capitano. Vai.

translation.en: Okay, guys. Here he comes.
[Bear] All right, listen up!
Tonight is the first time Hammarström has seen the new team.
translation.it: Hammarström oggi vede la nuova squadra per la prima volta.

translation.en: We're in this together. So I need you to play together.
translation.it: Ci siamo dentro tutti e voglio che giochiate insieme.

translation.en: MacBentley.
Let's go. Let's warm up.
Good.
Stick.
Good. Now visualize.
-Remember all your goals for the Cyclones? -Yes, coach.
translation.it: - Ricordi i tuoi goal per i Cyclones? - Sì, coach.

translation.en: I don't.
As far as I'm concerned, tonight is the first time you pulled on skates.
translation.it: Per me, stasera è la prima volta che indossi i pattini.

translation.en: -You show me what you got. -Yes, coach.
Come. I need a word with my new assistant coach.
translation.it: Vieni. Devo parlare con il mio nuovo assistente.

translation.en: Bentley.
-Oh, hey, buddy. What's up? -[mom] Hi, Anton.
translation.it: - Bentley. - Ehi, amico! - Ciao, Anton. - Scusate, non c'ero al vostro arrivo.

translation.en: Sorry I wasn't here when you arrived.
translation.it: - Ciao, Anton. - Scusate, non c'ero al vostro arrivo.

translation.en: I had a Legends tour in Russia, then a book launch in Sweden.
translation.it: Tour delle Leggende in Russia e lancio del libro in Svezia.

translation.en: You know how it is.
Yeah, we know.
-Still, great to be back on the ice again. -Yeah, nothing like it.
translation.it: - Bello essere di nuovo sul ghiaccio. - Già, niente di meglio.

translation.en: I need you in the stands. Yeah, I want training recorded.
translation.it: Vai sugli spalti. Voglio registrare l'allenamento.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
Yeah.
So, Mac's been training hard, haven't you, Mac?
translation.it: Mac si è allenato duramente, vero, Mac?

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Anton] This boy's a special player, huh?
translation.it: - Sì. - È un giocatore speciale, eh?

translation.en: I know talent when I see it. Your son. Your brother.
translation.it: Riconosco il talento quando lo vedo. Tuo figlio. Tuo fratello.

translation.en: The sky's the limit, huh?
Is she okay?
Uh, she's fine. She's just had a bit of a day.
translation.it: Sta bene. Ha avuto una brutta giornata.

translation.en: [Mac] Hey.
Fast pace, shouty eyes. Now, that's a Kayla storm-off if I've ever seen one.
translation.it: Passo veloce, occhiatacce. Una sfuriata alla Kayla, se non sbaglio.

translation.en: That's typical. First training session with Hammarström,
translation.it: Tipico. Primo allenamento con Hammarström, e devi far sì che riguardi te?

translation.en: you gotta make it all about you? Can't you just let me have my thing?
translation.it: Tipico. Primo allenamento con Hammarström, e devi far sì che riguardi te? Mi lasci avere almeno questo?

translation.en: You… Your thing? So it's not enough for you to steal my life in Canada.
translation.it: Almeno questo? Non basta avermi rubato la vita in Canada.

translation.en: -Now you wanna take skating from me too? -Oh, my G--
translation.it: - Ora vuoi togliermi il pattinaggio? - Oh, mio...

translation.en: So dramatic. -Get over yourself, Kayla. -Me and Jacob had something.
translation.it: - Che drammatica! Frena, Kayla. - Io e Jacob avevamo qualcosa.

translation.en: No, you and Jacob had a hobby.
translation.it: No, tu e Jacob avevate un hobby.

translation.en: Okay, it was peewee stuff.
I don't know if you've noticed, but I'm going for the literal NHL here.
translation.it: Non so se l'hai notato, ma io sono in corsa per la NHL.

translation.en: If it was that important, Mom and Dad would've found a way for you to stay.
translation.it: Se fosse stato importante, mamma e papà avrebbero trovato un modo per restare.

translation.en: No. Hey, hey, Kayla.
[Bear] Mac, let's go.
You good?
Yeah.
-Yeah, I'm fine. -You don't look fine.
translation.it: - Sì, sto bene. - Non mi sembra.

translation.en: -Nico. -[chuckling] What? He looks terrible.
Impress me.
Give me the puck.
Come take it from me.
♪ You are good and you are pure The angel knockin' at my door ♪
-We just need to make sure that she's-- -Kayla.
Yeah, Kayla.
No discipline in that family.
You can't be a success without discipline, without dedication.
translation.it: Non puoi avere successo senza disciplina, senza dedizione.

translation.en: Come on, Kayla!
Silly girl. She's gonna get herself hurt.
Oh, my!
You skate well.
Pull a stunt like that again, and you're banned from my rink, okay?
translation.it: Un'altra bravata e sei bandita dalla mia pista, ok?

translation.en: Come.
Mac, get changed. We're going home. And you, Kayla. Come on. Let's go.
translation.it: Mac, vai a cambiarti. Andiamo a casa. E tu, Kayla, forza, andiamo.

translation.en: [Bear] Mac!
Other Mac.
Nice moves.
[Anton] Bear, get into position. Nico, take Mac's place.
translation.it: Bear, in posizione. Nico, prendi il posto di Mac.

translation.en: Okay, everyone. Let's go.
[Luke] What the hell were you thinking? You look at me. Violence is never the answer.
translation.it: Ma cosa ti è preso? Guardami. La violenza non è mai la risposta.

translation.en: -Um, have you seen hockey? -[mom] Don't be smart.
translation.it: - Hai visto l'hockey? - Non fare il furbo.

translation.en: Never in anger, and never, ever against your sister.
translation.it: Mai arrabbiato e mai contro tua sorella.

translation.en: And as for you, we are so disappointed in you, Kayla.
translation.it: E quanto a te, siamo molto delusi, Kayla.

translation.en: That is not how we brought you up to behave.
translation.it: Non ti abbiamo educato così. Umiliare tuo fratello in quel modo.

translation.en: -Humiliating your brother like that. -In front of his whole team.
translation.it: Non ti abbiamo educato così. Umiliare tuo fratello in quel modo. Davanti a tutta la squadra, ad Anton.

translation.en: In front of Anton.
translation.it: Davanti a tutta la squadra, ad Anton.

translation.en: Oof, not exactly helping.
It's not how we do things in our family.
translation.it: Non ci comportiamo così nella nostra famiglia.

translation.en: No, I know exactly how we do things in our family.
translation.it: No, so esattamente come ci comportiamo in famiglia.

translation.en: We turn our whole world upside down, give up everything
translation.it: Capovolgiamo il nostro mondo, rinunciamo a tutto

translation.en: so one person can play a stupid sport.
translation.it: così una persona può praticare il suo stupido sport.

translation.en: Some family.
Kayla. Kayla!
I'll go.
Right. Well, I better start making some dinner, then. Dad was gonna make three-bean stew,
translation.it: Bene, meglio che prepari la cena. Papà avrebbe fatto lo stufato di fagioli,

translation.en: but after the day we've had, no need to inflict that on anyone.
translation.it: ma dopo questa giornata, non serve infliggerlo a nessuno.

translation.en: Mom.
I'm sorry.
It's not me you need to be saying sorry to, is it?
Blindsiding your sister like that. -What were you-- -No. I… [sighs]
translation.it: - Attaccare così tua sorella, a cosa... - No, io...

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah, that, obviously, but…
I…
I don't know. I just…
Today is all you need to be apologizing for, okay?
translation.it: È solo per oggi che devi scusarti, ok?

translation.en: 'Cause everything else we decided as a family.
translation.it: Perché tutto il resto è stata una decisione di famiglia.

translation.en: Yeah?
-Yeah. -Okay.
[Luke] Hey.
It's only me.
Oh, I remember that show.
I really miss it.
[Luke] Yeah.
Yeah, I know.
I miss the wind.
They have wind here. Oh, but not like in the Chinooks.
translation.it: - Qui c'è il vento. - Ma non come il Chinook.

translation.en: All that warm air coming in over the mountain.
translation.it: Tutta quell'aria calda che arriva dalla montagna.

translation.en: English wind is just, uh, windy.
translation.it: Il vento inglese è solo ventoso.

translation.en: I'm sorry you miss stuff too. Yeah. You know, it's not forever.
translation.it: - Mi spiace manchi qualcosa anche a te. - Sì. Sai, non è per sempre.

translation.en: And you know what I don't miss?
translation.it: E sai cosa non mi manca?

translation.en: You.
And your brother and your mom.
translation.it: E tuo fratello e tua madre.

translation.en: 'Cause you're right here with me.
'Cause Canada might be where we're from, but home, that's wherever we're together.
translation.it: Forse il Canada è da dove veniamo, ma casa è ovunque, se siamo insieme.

translation.en: Right?
So, if I had a crazy dream, you'd make it work for me too?
translation.it: Quindi, se avessi un sogno folle, faresti lo stesso per me?

translation.en: In a heartbeat.
Well, maybe not for that, uh, that skater your mom found.
translation.it: Beh, forse non per quel pattinatore trovato da tua madre.

translation.en: [Mac] Hey, Mom? I'm goin' out.
Hi.
-Hi. [clears throat] -[phone ringing]
Hi.
[Anton] Hello?
Hi.
[accented] Is that Mr. Hammarström?
Who is this?
There's something you need to know.
[Kayla] There you are.
[Kayla] Hey, 67, wait.
Please, please. Just, you felt it too.
translation.it: Ti prego. L'hai sentita anche tu.

translation.en: That connection. I know you did.
translation.it: La connessione. So che è così.

translation.en: I'm guessing that helmet's not for show.
translation.it: Forse il casco non è per bellezza.

translation.en: So if it's a secret, I'll keep it, but please just tell me who you are.
translation.it: Quindi, se è un segreto lo terrò, ma ti prego dimmi chi sei.

translation.en: [Anton] Hey, you!
